spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct, but door orientations in the bedroom and kitchen hallway are flipped compared to the 2D plan. Window in the bedroom is slightly wider than designated.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and logically adjacent. Wall thickness is consistent. The utility area transition lacks the clear partition indicated in the floorplan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping; scale and placement of the dining set, sofas, and bed match the 2D reference closely.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality isometric rendering with clean geometry and soft lighting. Orthographic projection is well-maintained.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen entrance door and bedroom entrance door are swinging in the opposite direction of the floorplan markings.
The balcony sliding door tracks appear thicker horizontally than proportioned in the schematic.
Minor rendering artifact where the utility room floor texture clips into the kitchen boundary.
